shortcuts.title: Keyboard Shortcuts
shortcuts.pageDescription: Master Nova with these keyboard shortcuts. Work faster, type less.
shortcuts.tipText: Press тМШK anywhere to quickly search and navigate

cmdK.detail: The fastest way to do anything in Nova.

question.detail: Opens this shortcuts modal from anywhere.

escape.detail: Closes any open modal or dialog.

cmdN.detail: Start a fresh conversation with Nova.

cmdB.detail: Show or hide the conversations sidebar.

gH.detail: Press G then H to go home.

gC.detail: Press G then C to go to chat.

gS.detail: Press G then S for settings.

gP.detail: Press G then P for pricing.
